IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: THE SUPPORT OF CHARITABLE HEALTHCARE, EDUCATION, AND RESEARCH
IRS990.MissionDescription: THE SUPPORT OF CHARITABLE HEALTHCARE, EDUCATION, AND RESEARCH
IRS990.Description: PROVIDE FUNDS TO MARY FREE BED GUILD, MARY FREE BED HOSPITAL, AND MARY FREE BED BRACE & CORSET SHOP (ALL 501(C)(3) CORPORATIONS) TO COVER COSTS OF MEDICAL SERVICES AND PROGRAMS; EQUIPMENT AND ADAPTIVE DEVICES FOR PATIENTS; PROVIDE GRANTS TO VARIOUS COMMUNITY ORGANIZATIONS TO IMPROVE THE WELFARE OF THE PHYSICALLY DISABLED AND THE GENERAL HEALTH OF THE COMMUNITY.

Activity2.Description: PROVIDE SPECFIC ASSISTANCE TO FAMILIES AND DISABLED FAMILY MEMBERS TO HELP COVER COSTS OF EQUIPMENT, MEDICAL CARE, ORTHOTIC AND PROSTHETIC DEVICES, SEATING SYSTEMS, RECREATION, LODGING SUBSIDIES FOR OUT-OF-TOWN FAMILIES, ADAPTIVE BICYCLES, AND SCHOLARSHIPS TO MINORITY STUDENTS.

Activity3.Description: TO PROVIDE SPACE, EQUIPMENT, AND OUTDOOR THERAPY AREA FOR MARY FREE BED HOSPITAL AND MARY FREE BED BRACE & CORSET SHOP (BOTH 501(C)(3) CORPORATIONS) STAFF AND PATIENTS

ActivityOther.Description: TO PROVIDE EDUCATION AND RESERACH ON MEDICAL REHABILITATION AND DISEASE/INJURY PREVENTION

Name.BusinessNameLine1: MARY FREE BED BRACE & CORSET SHOP

Form990ScheduleIPartIII.TypeOfGrant: LIVING LIGHT DANCE COMPANY - DANCE THEATER FOR THE DISABLED
LODGING FOR PATIENTS AND THEIR FAMILIES

Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Identifier: Procedure for Monitoring Grants in the U.S.:
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: Schedule I, Part I, Line 2: THE USE OF FUNDS IS SPECIFIED IN THE GRANT APPLICATION AND REINFORCED IN A LETTER SENT WITH THE GRANT AWARD. MARY FREE BED FUND REVIEWS THE 990S OF POTENTIAL RECIPIENTS PRIOR TO AWARDING THE GRANT. ADDITIONALLY, INTERNAL BUDGETS, FINANCIAL STATEMENTS, AND AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS OF THE GRANT RECIPIENTS ARE REVIEWED BY MARY FREE BED FUND. OCCASIONALLY, ONE OR MORE OF THE BOARD MEMBERS WILL VISIT THE COMPANY OR ATTEND THE EVENT FOR WHICH THE GRANT IS USED.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 6
Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 7a
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF THE MARY FREE BED FUND EXERCISE THE RIGHT TO ELECT BOARD MEMBERS OF THE GOVERNING BODY. AT NO TIME SHALL MORE THAN 49% OF THE DIRECTORS BE TRUSTEES, EMPLOYEES, OR MEDICAL STAFF MEMBERS OF MARY FREE BED HOSPITAL & REHABILITATION CENTER.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 7b
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: MARY FREE BED GUILD, THE SOLE STOCKHOLDER, MUST APPROVE CERTAIN MARY FREE BED FUND TRANSACTIONS SUCH AS REAL ESTATE TRANSACTIONS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: NO REVIEW WAS OR WILL BE CONDUCTED.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICIES ARE UPDATED ANNUALLY BY ALL BOARD MEMBERS, OFFICERS, AND STAFF. PROCESS IS ADMINISTERED OUT OF THE EXECUTIVE ADMINISTRATION OFFICE. ANY DISCLOSED CONFLICTS OF INTEREST WOULD BE DISCLOSED TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND ASSURANCES OBTAINED THAT NO ILLEGAL OR SUBSIDIZED ACTIVITIES ARE OCCURING.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ARE NOT AVAILABLE FOR PUBLIC INSPECTION. FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE SUMMARIZED IN AN ANNUAL REPORT WHICH IS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC.
THERE HAS BEEN NO CHANGE IN PROCESS FROM PRIOR YEAR.
